content: * GREEN PLAINS ANNOUNCES OFFER TO ACQUIRE GREEN PLAINS PARTNERS LP* GREEN PLAINS INC - PROPOSED DEAL FOR $13.08 PER COMMON UNIT* GREEN PLAINS INC - PROPOSED DEAL FOR 0.3913 SHARES OF GREEN PLAINS INC. COMMON STOCK FOR EACH OUTSTANDING PUBLICLY HELD PARTNERSHIP COMMON UNIT* GREEN PLAINS INC - ASSUMING COMPLETION OF PROPOSED TRANSACTION, PARTNERSHIP WOULD BECOME A WHOLLY OWNED SUBSIDIARY OF GREEN PLAINS INC.* GREEN PLAINS INC - EXPECTS PROPOSED DEAL TO SIMPLIFY ITS CORPORATE STRUCTURE AND GOVERNANCE, GENERATE NEAR-TERM EARNINGS AND CASH FLOW ACCRETION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
